sentences.sContent: This last task is possibly the most difficult.
sentences.sCn: 这最后一项任务也许是最难的。

sentences.sContent: It will take three weeks, possibly longer.
sentences.sCn: 要花三个星期，也许更久。

sentences.sContent: ‘Was it murder?’ ‘ Quite possibly (= it is very likely ) .’

words.tran: 可能性；合适的人；可能的事物
可能性；可能发生的事物

trans.tranOther: used when saying that something may be true or likely, although you are not completely certain
